fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Dance, roleblocking all your visitors.

> Perform, roleblocking all of your target's town visitors. Evils will know if they visit your performing target.

> Participate in the Grand Finale, roleblocking all good faction players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> The first time you would be executed, you dance out of the way of the execution, living but revealing your role. You will be able to use all your abilities the night after this happens. (You can't participate in the grand finale if you already have)

> This role can't spawn with Everfrost.

> You will learn the role of any non-good faction member you roleblock/would roleblock.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Have the good faction lose the game. (You can win while dead)
